data.actual_result: You're stuck with messages whizzing by. happened earlier to me in hypeSquad bot spam channel
data.expected_result: You *should* be able to change to a different channel
data.short_description: Can't close channel with continuous stream of messages
data.steps_to_repro: - look at text channel with constant messages - more than 10 or so messages per second - Two to switch to another chat
